name: Soul Guardian
text_description: The Soul Guardian, a protector of realms harnessing the power of spirits. When Soul Guardian comes into play, all Spirit type cards gain +2 defense.
illustration_description: A tall, slender humanoid figure shimmers with ethereal, silver glow surrounded by a ghostly aura. Its long arms outstretched, casting a protective shield around. The background is a purplish celestial landscape with stars twinkling.
